title: Spotted: New Campagnolo Super Record 13-Speed Groupset All But Confirmed by Giro d’Italia Appearance
content:
An extra cog, revised shift levers, and weight cutting measures. It certainly seems a new Campagnolo grouspet is right around the corner.

Read the full article at Spotted: New Campagnolo Super Record 13-Speed Groupset All But Confirmed by Giro d’Italia Appearance on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
